scripts.rebuild: npm run-script purge-node-modules && lerna bootstrap && npm run-script lerna-run-compile
scripts.dist-publish: npm run-script purge-node-modules && lerna bootstrap && npm run-script lerna-run-compile && npm run-script lerna-run-dist && npm run-script lerna-npm-publish | tee dist-publish.log
scripts.dist-release: npm run-script dist-publish && lerna run dist-release
scripts.purge-node-modules: rm -rf node_modules && lerna exec --concurrency=1 --parallel=false --no-bail -- 'pwd && rm -rf node_modules'
